actions.text: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 1 (Roll no. 638).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Harder (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 414 - 1 (Roll no. 638).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to ensure that nothing in this Act shall be construed to limit or prevent healthcare workers from reporting violent incidents to appropriate law enforcement.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to ensure that nothing in this Act shall be construed to limit or prevent healthcare workers from reporting violent incidents to appropriate law enforcement.
